name: Hezrou
damage_resistances: bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The hezrou has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Stench
special_abilities.desc: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the hezrou must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of its next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the hezrou's stench for 24 hours.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The hezrou makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 15 (2d10 + 4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
